memo_text:
* Bidder 1, starting with $20000, has won 4 items in this auction, with a total profit of $7800.:
  * Won Thingamajig C at $1100 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
  * Won Apparatus H at $3500 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Unit Q at $6000 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Gadget B at $1600 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.

* Bidder 2, starting with $20000, has won 2 items in this auction, with a total profit of $3600.:
  * Won Implement G at $3200 over $3000, with a true value of $6000.
  * Won Widget A at $1200 over $1000, with a true value of $2000.
* Bidder 3, starting with $20000, has won 0 items in this auction, with a total profit of $0.:

* Bidder 4, starting with $20000, has won 4 items in this auction, with a total profit of $11300.:
  * Won Mechanism J at $4900 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
  * Won Machine P at $6500 over $5000, with a true value of $10000.
  * Won Equipment E at $2700 over $2000, with a true value of $4000.
  * Won Utensil N at $4600 over $4000, with a true value of $8000.
